class.name: WeightedEvaluation

javadoc.text: Returns the result of evaluating the statistic over the input array, * using the supplied weights.
javadoc.return: the value of the weighted statistic applied to the input array
javadoc.throws: MathIllegalArgumentException if either array is null, lengths * do not match, weights contain NaN, negative or infinite values, or * weights does not include at least on positive value

javadoc.text: Returns the result of evaluating the statistic over the specified entries * in the input array, using corresponding entries in the supplied weights array.
javadoc.param: begin the index of the first element to include
length the number of elements to include
javadoc.return: the value of the weighted statistic applied to the included array entries
javadoc.throws: MathIllegalArgumentException if either array is null, lengths * do not match, indices are invalid, weights contain NaN, negative or * infinite values, or weights does not include at least on positive value
